verses.verse: In the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar,<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> <S%H2472>dreams;<s%> and his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was <S%H6470>troubled,<s%> and his <S%H8142>sleep<s%> went from <S%H1961>him.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> the <S%H2748>magicians,<s%> and the <S%H825>enchanters,<s%> and the <S%H3784>sorcerers,<s%> and the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> his <S%H2472>dreams.<s%> So they <S%H935>came<s%> in and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2492>them,<s%> I have dreamed a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H6470>troubled<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H2472>dream.<s%>

Then <S%H1696>spoke<s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> in the Syrian <S%H762>language,<s%> O <S%H4430>king,<s%> <S%H2418>live<s%> <S%H5957>forever:<s%> <S%H560>tell<s%> your <S%H5649>servants<s%> the <S%H2493>dream,<s%> and we will <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation.<s%>

The <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> the <S%H3779>Chaldeans,<s%> The <S%H4406>thing<s%> is <S%H230>gone<s%> from <S%H4481>me:<s%> <S%H2006>if<s%> you <S%H3809>don't<s%> make <S%H3046>known<s%> to me the <S%H2493>dream<s%> and its <S%H6591>interpretation,<s%> you shall be <S%H5648>cut<s%> in <S%H1917>pieces,<s%> and your <S%H1005>houses<s%> shall be <S%H7761>made<s%> a <S%H5122>dunghill.<s%>

But <S%H2006>if<s%> you <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H2493>dream<s%> and its <S%H6591>interpretation,<s%> you shall <S%H6902>receive<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> <S%H6925>me<s%> <S%H4978>gifts<s%> and <S%H5023>rewards<s%> and <S%H7690>great<s%> <S%H3367>honor:<s%> <S%H3861>therefore<s%> <S%H2324>show<s%> me the <S%H2493>dream<s%> and its <S%H6591>interpretation.<s%>

They <S%H6032>answered<s%> the <S%H8579>second<s%> time and <S%H560>said,<s%> Let the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H560>tell<s%> his <S%H5649>servants<s%> the <S%H2493>dream,<s%> and we will <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation.<s%>

The <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>answered,<s%> <S%H576>I<s%> <S%H3046>know<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> a <S%H3330>certainty<s%> that <S%H608>you<s%> would <S%H2084>gain<s%> <S%H5732>time,<s%> <S%H6903>because<s%> you <S%H2370>see<s%> the <S%H4406>thing<s%> is <S%H230>gone<s%> from <S%H4481>me.<s%>

But <S%H2006>if<s%> you <S%H3809>don't<s%> make <S%H3046>known<s%> to me the <S%H2493>dream,<s%> there is but <S%H1932>one<s%> <S%H1882>law<s%> for <S%H2164>you;<s%> for you have prepared <S%H3538>lying<s%> and <S%H7844>corrupt<s%> <S%H4406>words<s%> to <S%H560>speak<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> <S%H5705>me,<s%> until the <S%H5732>time<s%> be <S%H8133>changed:<s%> <S%H3861>therefore<s%> <S%H560>tell<s%> me the <S%H2493>dream,<s%> and I shall <S%H3046>know<s%> <S%H1768>that<s%> you can <S%H2324>show<s%> me its <S%H6591>interpretation.<s%>

The <S%H3779>Chaldeans<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> and <S%H560>said,<s%> There <S%H383>is<s%> <S%H3809>not<s%> a <S%H606>man<s%> <S%H5922>on<s%> the <S%H3007>earth<s%> who <S%H3202>can<s%> <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>'s <S%H4406>matter,<s%> <S%H6903>because<s%> <S%H3809>no<s%> <S%H4430>king,<s%> <S%H7229>lord,<s%> or <S%H7990>ruler,<s%> has <S%H7593>asked<s%> <S%H1836>such<s%> a <S%H4406>thing<s%> of <S%H3606>any<s%> <S%H2749>magician,<s%> or <S%H826>enchanter,<s%> or <S%H3779>Chaldean.<s%>

It is a <S%H3358>rare<s%> <S%H4406>thing<s%> that the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H7593>requires,<s%> and there <S%H383>is<s%> <S%H3809>no<s%> <S%H321>other<s%> who can <S%H2324>show<s%> it <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> <S%H3861>except<s%> the <S%H426>gods,<s%> whose <S%H4070>dwelling<s%> <S%H383>is<s%> <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H5974>with<s%> <S%H1321>flesh.<s%>

<S%H6903>For<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H3606>cause<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> was <S%H1149>angry<s%> and <S%H7690>very<s%> <S%H7108>furious,<s%> and <S%H560>commanded<s%> to <S%H7>destroy<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon.<s%>

So the <S%H1882>decree<s%> went <S%H5312>forth,<s%> and the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men were to be <S%H6992>slain;<s%> and they <S%H1156>sought<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> and his <S%H2269>companions<s%> to be <S%H6992>slain.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> returned <S%H8421>answer<s%> with <S%H5843>counsel<s%> and <S%H2942>prudence<s%> to <S%H746>Arioch<s%> the <S%H7229>captain<s%> <S%H1768>of<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>'s <S%H2877>guard,<s%> who was gone <S%H5312>forth<s%> to <S%H6992>kill<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon;<s%>

he <S%H6032>answered<s%> <S%H746>Arioch<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>'s <S%H7990>captain,<s%> <S%H4101>Why<s%> is the <S%H1882>decree<s%> so <S%H2685>urgent<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> the <S%H4430>king?<s%> <S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H746>Arioch<s%> made the <S%H4406>thing<s%> <S%H3046>known<s%> to <S%H1841>Daniel.<s%>

<S%H1841>Daniel<s%> went <S%H5954>in,<s%> and <S%H1156>desired<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> that he would <S%H5415>appoint<s%> him a <S%H2166>time,<s%> and he would <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H236>went<s%> to his <S%H1005>house,<s%> and made the <S%H4406>thing<s%> <S%H3046>known<s%> to <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> <S%H4333>Mishael,<s%> and <S%H5839>Azariah,<s%> his <S%H2269>companions:<s%>

that they would <S%H1156>desire<s%> <S%H7359>mercies<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%> <S%H5922>concerning<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H7328>secret;<s%> that <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> and his <S%H2269>companions<s%> should <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H7>perish<s%> <S%H5974>with<s%> the <S%H7606>rest<s%> of the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> was the <S%H7328>secret<s%> <S%H1541>revealed<s%> to <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> in a <S%H2376>vision<s%> of the <S%H3916>night.<s%> <S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H1289>blessed<s%> the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven.<s%>

<S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H6032>answered,<s%> <S%H1289>Blessed<s%> <S%H1934>be<s%> the <S%H8036>name<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H5705>forever<s%> and <S%H5957>ever;<s%> <S%H4481>for<s%> <S%H2452>wisdom<s%> and <S%H1370>might<s%> are <S%H1932>his.<s%>

He <S%H8133>changes<s%> the <S%H5732>times<s%> and the <S%H2166>seasons;<s%> he <S%H5709>removes<s%> <S%H4430>kings,<s%> and sets <S%H6966>up<s%> <S%H4430>kings;<s%> he <S%H3052>gives<s%> <S%H2452>wisdom<s%> to the <S%H2445>wise,<s%> and <S%H4486>knowledge<s%> to those who <S%H3046>have<s%> <S%H999>understanding;<s%>

he <S%H1541>reveals<s%> the <S%H5994>deep<s%> and secret <S%H5642>things;<s%> he <S%H3046>knows<s%> <S%H4101>what<s%> is in the <S%H2816>darkness,<s%> and the <S%H5094>light<s%> <S%H8271>dwells<s%> with <S%H5974>him.<s%>

<S%H576>I<s%> <S%H3029>thank<s%> <S%H7624>you,<s%> and praise <S%H426>you,<s%> you God of my <S%H2>fathers,<s%> who have <S%H3052>given<s%> me <S%H2452>wisdom<s%> and <S%H1370>might,<s%> and have <S%H3705>now<s%> made <S%H3046>known<s%> to me what we <S%H1156>desired<s%> of <S%H4481>you;<s%> for you have made <S%H3046>known<s%> to us the <S%H4430>king<s%>'s <S%H4406>matter.<s%>

<S%H6903>Therefore<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> went <S%H5954>in<s%> <S%H5922>to<s%> <S%H746>Arioch,<s%> whom the <S%H4430>king<s%> had <S%H4483>appointed<s%> to <S%H7>destroy<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon;<s%> he <S%H236>went<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H3652>thus<s%> to <S%H409>him:<s%> Don't <S%H7>destroy<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon;<s%> bring me <S%H5954>in<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> and I will <S%H2324>show<s%> to the <S%H4430>king<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H746>Arioch<s%> brought <S%H5954>in<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> in <S%H927>haste,<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H3652>thus<s%> to <S%H7912>him,<s%> I have found a <S%H1400>man<s%> of the children of the <S%H1123>captivity<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> <S%H3061>Judah,<s%> who will make <S%H3046>known<s%> to the <S%H4430>king<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation.<s%>

The <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel,<s%> whose <S%H8036>name<s%> was <S%H1096>Belteshazzar,<s%> <S%H383>Are<s%> you <S%H3546>able<s%> to make <S%H3046>known<s%> to me the <S%H2493>dream<s%> which I have <S%H2370>seen,<s%> and its <S%H6591>interpretation?<s%>

<S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> and <S%H560>said,<s%> The <S%H7328>secret<s%> which the <S%H4430>king<s%> has <S%H7593>demanded<s%> can <S%H3202>neither<s%> <S%H2445>wise<s%> <S%H826>men,<s%> enchanters, <S%H2749>magicians,<s%> nor <S%H1505>soothsayers,<s%> <S%H2324>show<s%> to the <S%H4430>king;<s%>

<S%H1297>but<s%> there <S%H383>is<s%> a <S%H426>God<s%> in <S%H8065>heaven<s%> who <S%H1541>reveals<s%> <S%H7328>secrets,<s%> and he has made <S%H3046>known<s%> to the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4101>what<s%> shall <S%H1934>be<s%> in the <S%H320>latter<s%> <S%H3118>days.<s%> Your <S%H2493>dream,<s%> and the <S%H2376>visions<s%> of your <S%H7217>head<s%> <S%H5922>on<s%> your <S%H4903>bed,<s%> are <S%H1836>these:<s%>

as for <S%H607>you,<s%> O <S%H4430>king,<s%> your <S%H7476>thoughts<s%> <S%H5559>came<s%> into your mind <S%H5922>on<s%> your <S%H4903>bed,<s%> <S%H4101>what<s%> should <S%H1934>happen<s%> <S%H311>hereafter;<s%> and he who <S%H1541>reveals<s%> <S%H7328>secrets<s%> has made <S%H3046>known<s%> to you <S%H4101>what<s%> shall <S%H1934>happen.<s%>

But as for <S%H576>me,<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H7328>secret<s%> is <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H1541>revealed<s%> to <S%H576>me<s%> for any <S%H2452>wisdom<s%> that I <S%H383>have<s%> more <S%H4481>than<s%> <S%H3606>any<s%> <S%H2417>living,<s%> <S%H3861>but<s%> to the intent <S%H5922>that<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> may be made <S%H3046>known<s%> to the <S%H4430>king,<s%> and that you may <S%H3046>know<s%> the <S%H7476>thoughts<s%> of your <S%H3825>heart.<s%>

<S%H607>You,<s%> O <S%H4430>king,<s%> <S%H1934>saw,<s%> and <S%H431>behold,<s%> a <S%H2298>great<s%> <S%H6755>image.<s%> <S%H1797>This<s%> <S%H6755>image,<s%> which was <S%H7229>mighty,<s%> and whose <S%H2122>brightness<s%> was <S%H3493>excellent,<s%> <S%H6966>stood<s%> <S%H6903>before<s%> <S%H7299>you;<s%> and its aspect was <S%H1763>awesome.<s%>

As for this <S%H6755>image,<s%> its <S%H7217>head<s%> was of <S%H2869>fine<s%> <S%H1722>gold,<s%> its <S%H2306>breast<s%> and its <S%H1872>arms<s%> of <S%H3702>silver,<s%> its <S%H4577>belly<s%> and its <S%H3410>thighs<s%> of <S%H5174>brass,<s%>
its <S%H8243>legs<s%> of <S%H6523>iron,<s%> its <S%H7271>feet<s%> <S%H4481>part<s%> of <S%H6523>iron,<s%> and <S%H4481>part<s%> of <S%H2635>clay.<s%>

You <S%H2370>saw<s%> <S%H5705>until<s%> a <S%H69>stone<s%> was cut <S%H1505>out<s%> <S%H3809>without<s%> <S%H3028>hands,<s%> which <S%H4223>struck<s%> the <S%H6755>image<s%> <S%H5922>on<s%> its <S%H7271>feet<s%> that were of <S%H6523>iron<s%> and <S%H2635>clay,<s%> and <S%H1855>broke<s%> <S%H1994>them<s%> in <S%H1855>pieces.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> was the <S%H6523>iron,<s%> the <S%H2635>clay,<s%> the <S%H5174>brass,<s%> the <S%H3702>silver,<s%> and the <S%H1722>gold,<s%> broken in <S%H1855>pieces<s%> <S%H2298>together,<s%> and <S%H1934>became<s%> like the <S%H5784>chaff<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H7007>summer<s%> threshing <S%H147>floors;<s%> and the <S%H7308>wind<s%> <S%H5376>carried<s%> <S%H1994>them<s%> <S%H5376>away,<s%> so <S%H3606>that<s%> <S%H3809>no<s%> <S%H870>place<s%> was <S%H7912>found<s%> for <S%H69>them:<s%> and the stone that <S%H4223>struck<s%> the <S%H6755>image<s%> <S%H1934>became<s%> a <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H2906>mountain,<s%> and <S%H4391>filled<s%> the <S%H3606>whole<s%> <S%H772>earth.<s%>
<S%H1836>This<s%> is the <S%H2493>dream;<s%> and we will <S%H560>tell<s%> its <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king.<s%>

<S%H607>You,<s%> O <S%H4430>king,<s%> are <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H4430>kings,<s%> to whom the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%> has <S%H3052>given<s%> the <S%H4437>kingdom,<s%> the <S%H2632>power,<s%> and the <S%H8632>strength,<s%> and the <S%H3367>glory;<s%>

and <S%H3606>wherever<s%> the <S%H1123>children<s%> of <S%H606>men<s%> <S%H1753>dwell,<s%> the <S%H2423>animals<s%> of the <S%H1251>field<s%> and the <S%H5776>birds<s%> of the <S%H8065>sky<s%> has he <S%H3052>given<s%> into your <S%H3028>hand,<s%> and has made you to <S%H7981>rule<s%> over them <S%H3606>all:<s%> <S%H607>you<s%> are the <S%H7217>head<s%> of <S%H1722>gold.<s%>

<S%H870>After<s%> you shall <S%H6966>arise<s%> <S%H317>another<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> <S%H772>inferior<s%> to <S%H4481>you;<s%> and <S%H317>another<s%> <S%H8523>third<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5174>brass,<s%> which shall bear <S%H7981>rule<s%> over <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H772>earth.<s%>

The <S%H7244>fourth<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> shall <S%H1934>be<s%> <S%H8624>strong<s%> as <S%H6523>iron,<s%> because <S%H6523>iron<s%> breaks in <S%H1855>pieces<s%> and <S%H2827>subdues<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H6903>things;<s%> and as <S%H6523>iron<s%> that <S%H7490>crushes<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H459>these,<s%> shall it break in <S%H1855>pieces<s%> and <S%H7490>crush.<s%>

As the <S%H677>toes<s%> of the <S%H7271>feet<s%> were <S%H4481>part<s%> of <S%H6523>iron,<s%> and <S%H4481>part<s%> of <S%H2635>clay,<s%> so the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> shall <S%H1934>be<s%> <S%H4481>partly<s%> <S%H8624>strong,<s%> and <S%H4481>partly<s%> <S%H8406>broken.<s%>
